byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka and Nida Najar reported from New Delhi
byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and NIDA NAJAR

abstract: Bangladesh security officials arrest Shafiur Rahman Farabi for murder of Avijit Roy, Bangladeshi-American blogger who criticized radical Islam; Roy was hacked to death Feb 26 in Dhaka; Farabi posted a threat on Facebook last year to kill Roy.
lead_paragraph: Shafiur Rahman Farabi was arrested in connection with the deadly attack on Avijit Roy, a Bangladeshi-American writer who was critical of extremist Islam.

headline.main: Bangladeshi Police Arrest Suspect in Blogger’s Killing
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh: Man Arrested in Death of Bangladeshi-American Blogger

snippet: Shafiur Rahman Farabi was arrested in connection with the deadly attack on Avijit Roy, a Bangladeshi-American writer who was critical of extremist Islam.
